edge: A MOVIE is represented by its SUMMARY which provides details about the movie.
Jabariya Jodi is the title of an Indian Hindi-language romantic comedy film that explores the tradition of groom kidnapping prevalent in Bihar.
Sidharth Malhotra and Parineeti Chopra are the lead actors of Jabariya Jodi.
Ekta Kapoor, Shobha Kapoor and Shailesh R Singh are the producers of Jabariya Jodi.
Prashant Singh is the director of Jabariya Jodi.
The story of Jabariya Jodi is based on the tradition of groom kidnapping, which is prevalent in Bihar.
The official data revealed that more abductions happen for the purpose of forced marriage than ransom in recent years in Bihar.
Sanjeev K Jha, who is familiar with the forced marriage practice in his native state, created a comic world and a love-story using this bizarre practices for Jabariya Jodi.
Jabariya Jodi was filmed in Lucknow, Barabanki and Raebareli.
The release date of Jabariya Jodi was initially scheduled to be 17 May 2019, but had to be pushed back multiple times.

node_2: background music scored by joel crasto
edge: Joel Crasto composed the background music for the film, while Tanishk Bagchi contributed to the soundtrack alongside other composers.
Nandini Ramnath reviewed the film and gave it a rating of 1.5 stars on 5, stating that it had an 'inexplicably convoluted' plotline.
Sandip Pal discussed the performances in the film, commenting that Sidharth Malhotra was comfortable in his role but struggled with body language and Bihari dialect.
Sandip Pal discussed Parineeti Chopra's character, describing her as 'feisty' and 'cheeky' in the first half but 'crying and sulking' in the second half.
Koimoi recommended whether to watch or not, stating that the film had 'not'-worthy elements but also 'what is'.
The lyrics for the soundtrack were written by several composers, including Raj Shekhar and others.

edge: Siddharth-Garima contributed to the soundtrack, alongside other composers and Joel Crasto's background music.
The lyrics for the soundtrack were also written by Rashmi Virag, in addition to others.
Shabbir Ahmed was another writer of lyrics for the soundtrack.
Kumaar also contributed to the writing of lyrics for the film's soundtrack.
When the movie plays for the laughs, it is quite entertaining.
However, in the second half, the movie goes horribly messed up.
The movie provides some of the fun moments when it plays for the laughs.
But, amps up the romance and lets the movie down.
Sidharth Malhotra does his best.
Parineeti Chopra also does her best.
But, their muddled characterisation lets the movie down.
The viewer needs to filter out what's not important to their taste.
Lakshana N Palat from India Today reviewed the movie Jabariya Jodi and rated it as 'excruciatingly painful' with a rating of 1.5 out of 5 stars.
The Times of India's Ronak Kotecha rated the movie Jabariya Jodi as having a narrative that 'doesn't feel all that jabardust'
Shubhra Gupta of The Indian Express rated the movie Jabariya Jodi as a 'confused long drawn mess' with a rating of 1 out of 5 stars.
Jabariya Jodi's opening day collection was ₹27.0 million.
The second day collection of Jabariya Jodi was ₹37.0 million.
As the movie progressed, its collection for the third day went up to ₹45.0 million.
The total collection of Jabariya Jodi for the opening weekend was ₹109.0 million.
As of 23 August 2019, with a gross of ₹19.21 crore in India,
the film has a worldwide gross collection of ₹21.13 crore with a gross of ₹1.92 crore overseas.
